SELECT count(v_timeline.createDate) FROM v_timeline
v_timeline.`followId` = #{userId} and ( v_timeline.redFlg = '0' OR v_timeline.redFlg is NULL)

SELECT
v_timeline.`articleBean.id` as `articleBean.id`, v_timeline.`articleBean.title` as `articleBean.title`, v_timeline.`userBean.id` as `userBean.id`, v_timeline.`userBean.nickname` as `userBean.nickname`, v_timeline.content as content, v_timeline.createDate as createDate, v_timeline.action as action,
FROM v_timeline
v_timeline.`followId` = #{userId} and ( v_timeline.redFlg = '0' OR v_timeline.redFlg is NULL)
